scripts.start:auth: cd services/auth-service-nestjs && pnpm exec nest start
scripts.start:gateway: cd services/api-gateway && pnpm exec nest start
scripts.start:message: cd services/message-service && pnpm exec nest start
scripts.dev:auth: cd services/auth-service-nestjs && pnpm exec nest start --watch
scripts.dev:gateway: cd services/api-gateway && pnpm exec nest start --watch
scripts.dev:message: cd services/message-service && pnpm exec nest start --watch
scripts.docker:build:all: pnpm docker:build:auth && pnpm docker:build:message && pnpm docker:build:gateway
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker compose down && docker compose build && docker compose up -d
